website_summaries.verdict: These yoga pants won't work for everyone's body or bank account, but provide superior material and support for those who can wear them.
pros: Seamless front leggings that provide excellent support throughout the structure, thanks to the brand's Slim-X fabric that also "breathes" for added comfort
cons: Expensive, and the fit can be snug, especially on individuals with substantial weight around the midsection

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt TEAR in the butt! Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I was a size 16/18 and needed something to hold my stretched skin (from after losing 80 lbs and having 5 kids) and this does the job! I've bought soooo many others that would tear when I did my gym classes but NOT THIS ONE! Ive bought 3! I'm now a size 12 and it continues to make me feel tight and not giggly!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Corley

customer_reviews.title: Transparent!! Had to lower my expectations from this ...
customer_reviews.text: Transparent!! Had to lower my expectations from this product and ended up in a specialized store buying one of the main brands (at a slightly little higher price).
customer_reviews.author: mnteo

customer_reviews.title: had to return..... Fit EXTREMELY ...
customer_reviews.text: had to return..... Fit EXTREMELY EXTREMELY .... WAY to small! I know they are supposed to compress you, but whoa!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: See-through.  Also, order a size up from your Spanx shapewear size
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, looked good, and felt nice. But way too see-through. Had to return. They would be fine if you were always wearing them under a skirt but I wanted to wear them to the gym. A note on sizing: I'm usually a medium in most bottoms but a small in Spanx shapewear. But based on comments here I ordered a medium for these leggings. It was a perfect fit, actually tighter than my current leggings which are Athleta mediums. So they are fairly true to size for leggings, but consider ordering up a size from your Spanx shapewear size.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the overall light compression. I have now ordered three pair of these. Only problem was some loss of compression when laundered, even in cold water and line dried. I bought them to deal with a previously crushed knee following a car accident. When I need more compression I wear a sleeve over the leggings. Great to sleep in. Overall good product at decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cook

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. My only issue is they go a ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. My only issue is they go a little high on the waist and tend to roll down during certain movements. On the other hand, my butt is completely covered and there is no see through.
customer_reviews.author: lizzyp0301

customer_reviews.title: LOVE..
customer_reviews.text: LOVE...LOVE...LOVE my Spanx! NOTHING moves, wiggles or jiggles! I have about 10 pair of other leggings in different brands (not cheap brands either)!. After I purchased my 1st pair of Spanx...I have NOT wore any of the others and dont plan on it!! These things do NOT stretch, change shape or fall down around waist, by end of day! I must say, I was a little skeptical about buying with such great price but these are fine and authentic! Thanks Spanks for another awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: This_Girl_Shops

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit and compression!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant after reading the other review about these being see through but decided to try them anyways and I'm glad I did. The length, compression, and fit are great and they're no more see through than the other Spanx leggings I own. I bent over in front of a mirror just to make sure lol and they're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 pairs of these - wear them all the time for both warmth, support, and to remove that pesky VPL under my yoga pants! These are sturdy enough to wear alone, but I always wear them as an underlayer. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: lizhill

customer_reviews.title: Suck it in, tuck it in, spanx will keep it there
customer_reviews.text: These things are phenomenal, I dont even have to work out to look good with the amazing way they work!
customer_reviews.author: Indy_dub_a_u

customer_reviews.title: Best workout pants ever!
customer_reviews.text: Feel awesome.Ofcourse wish they were cheaper but they are worth the money. As soon as I put them on my husband said , “you lost weight”.
customer_reviews.author: Cambridge Mudd

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: They make me look 10 pounds lighter but are surprisingly comfortable. What more could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Kaisa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money at all, too thin to wear alone without shirt cover.
customer_reviews.text: Looks too much like underwear to wear as active wear
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants - I wear them to run, spin and just lounge around the house. They fit perfectly, have just the right amount of compression to keep jiggly parts from jiggling, and look great.
customer_reviews.author: RaVo

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the top rolled down probably because of my big stomach
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.  Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear them after surgery. They initially put me in a large size (which I'm not normally) and I bought a medium in these and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have loved these for several years. Great workout capris!
customer_reviews.author: slightsey1

customer_reviews.title: They fit somewhat but when I workout they immediately roll ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit somewhat but when I workout they immediately roll down. I'm 5 foot 6 and weigh 140 pounds a I ordered a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Too small, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hard to pull up and felt too compressing to workout in
customer_reviews.author: italics353

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife to do Zumba and they look really really good on her
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Too high waisted-rolls down!
customer_reviews.text: It is too high up on the waist and rolls down.Give me a muffin top and I dont have one!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit-A  Bit Sheer
customer_reviews.text: Like these a lot..didn’t stretch out & nice high waist. .but too sheer for yoga if you don’t want people behind you to see your thong. Good for price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome leggings! Kind of hard to get on the first time, but they look amazing. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pilates
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable knee length leggings. Great for Pilates or even walking the dog. Fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: H. Moser

customer_reviews.title: Best workout tights ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best workout tights ever. Great compression, just thick enough to ensure a smooth apearance but not took thick. Very comfortable. Waist the perfect height. I've tried many brands, spanx is the best.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Runs small!
customer_reviews.text: Read the review and felt that the size was running true to size. When they arrived I could barely squeeze into them. I am a size 6/8. Ordered a medium. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: B. Loughrey

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an xl and I’m usually a large. The XL fits great. No muffin top!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I need satisfied with this product I only wish that they had pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit great
customer_reviews.text: These crop pants leggings fit wonderfully. The compress in all of the right places. Very comfortable,. love the high top and no camel toe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Doesn't provide any more support than any other ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Doesn't provide any more support than any other department store-type compression legging, and the waist simply can't stop rolling down! For this price, completely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was able to wear these comfortably post op. I purchased size XL. They fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Mslove

customer_reviews.title: Fit is too small
customer_reviews.text: Really not worth the price. I’m a XL bought a 3XL and they were too small
customer_reviews.author: Roseann T.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The high waist would "fold" on me making it uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: They don't roll under and I feel very secure, not squished.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: SEAMS COMING APART
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Spanx for many years. Just purchased these in June and the seams and crotch liner is coming apart...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reuss

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they would be great!
customer_reviews.text: Too sheer. Will have to wear with a long shirt and wouldn't wear to the gym. Other than that they would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does run small but so comfortable and supportive once I got the right size.
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: I love these, but I will return for a medium
customer_reviews.text: I love these, but I will return for a medium. They ran a bit larger than the size chart indicated.
customer_reviews.author: D.MarieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I got them to wear post-liposuction (legs) after the compression ...
customer_reviews.text: I got them to wear post-liposuction (legs) after the compression garment but I didn't know the waist would be so tight, also they roll down and after a while I can hardly breathe. Just hoping the leg compression is tight enough
customer_reviews.author: Cindy E

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Love love these !!!! Guess I won't need butt implants after all LOL!
customer_reviews.author: davina d fillichio

customer_reviews.title: great fit!
customer_reviews.text: love these pants. fabric hides what you want it to and the don't loose their stretch as you wear them. they hold you in and make you look great! My new favorite workout pant!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Robertson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are amazing! Great tummy control and they smoothed out my thighs. Wore them during a 5k and they are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love them, great fit and comfortable and does what they should
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Good product--but I don't like the funny location of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product--but I don't like the funny location of the seams. Where are the old school Spanx?? Can't seem to find ones that are similar to the ones I got about 10 years ago...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these Spanx
customer_reviews.text: I love these Spanx. I wear them to the gym and anytime I just want to be comfortable with a little bit of tummy control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best workout pants!!
customer_reviews.text: provides smoothing support - with the high waist design you won't have to worry about pulling up anything while you are jogging or doing yoga.
customer_reviews.author: NKC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE GREAT TO WORKOUT IN!!! I ALSO WEAR THEM UNDER OTHER PANTS TO KEEP ME WARM IN THE WINTER.
customer_reviews.author: PennySugar

customer_reviews.title: Gray basic compression Capri.
customer_reviews.text: Great light weight compression Capri. A must have basic. Wish Spanx broadened their line with other colors and designs. Quality is very nice. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The fit.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was comfortable and gave good coverage in the private area.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slims and feels secure. Band rolls down at waist slightly during workout.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna B. Willaford

customer_reviews.title: I bought another pair just like them two years ago and love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought another pair just like them two years ago and love them, so I was pretty certain the size would work. But I can't find them in the stores anywhere. So this were great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Szabo

customer_reviews.title: Firm backside!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only capri i could find with so much lycra!I like it! Who can argue with a firm backside??
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say that when I saw the price of these I nearly threw my ipad across the room, BUT I was so desperate that I caved and Im really glad I did! These are BOMB! smug and comfy, thick and yet loose enough to not make me wanna go postal at random moments like some of my other ones.. the only thing I would change is I would like them to be just a bit shorter so as not to hang out of the bottom of my skirts but thats minor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pants, the only negative is the shipping cost to australia
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: No spectacular results
customer_reviews.text: Granted, I didn't need anything spectacular, but I didn't notice any measurable change in my appearance when I had these on. They work okay as compression shorts, but I wouldn't buy them for any cosmetic reason.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Hen

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: These pants are wonderful. I wear them in the gym or with boots or like leggings,they are very comfortable and flattering. I will buy another one full length soon.
customer_reviews.author: Fay1978

customer_reviews.title: good fit good compression, I like the full waist band
customer_reviews.text: not too tight, but good support especially through the abdomen size true, I am 5'4 120 and small fits well has held up well to 2 washings somewhat expensive but if it lasts through repeated use it will be worth it
customer_reviews.author: dotmom

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies the expectations
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, true to size, it is thin but not see through. I live in Miami and it is great for soemone who does not want to get hot wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great and gives you smooth and slender appearance. I bought a second pair. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: dpatsy

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love the pants, their little snug but they still did that work of compression!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: MORE FOR APPLE SHAPE
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because it was see through in the rear... it is made for more of an "apple" shape than a pear shape...Has GREAT tummy support but not so much in the rear and thigh.
customer_reviews.author: astoria

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Yes this item doesn't fit. Decided to keep since I'm going to the gym everyday. But compared to a pair I already have in this size the cut is smaller
customer_reviews.author: Nana SKM

customer_reviews.title: Love !
customer_reviews.text: I thought these looked thin and small when I opened the pkg but they are awesome !
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Too prone to holes
customer_reviews.text: These leggings fit well, but their longevity leaves something to be desired. After about a month of normal washing and wear, I started to notice holes, which made them unsuitable for exercising in public.
customer_reviews.author: NNYC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these fit and they're perfect for errands or the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love this compression pants. I mainly use them under my workout clothes and the sizing is the same for any other spanx pant.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: expensive but girlfriend says it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend. She loves the feel and fit of them. I also like the feel of them as well. Ultra smooth. But as a concerned bf with all the pervs out there, I like these because they are sturdy and not revealing due to the thickness and construction.
customer_reviews.author: ejunkymonkey

customer_reviews.title: Size not true. I've bought other brands in this ...
customer_reviews.text: Size not true. I've bought other brands in this size, and they fit. This was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Michaud

product_meta.title: Spanx Active Women's Shaping Compression Knee Pant Black Pants
feature_bullets: Slim-x performance fabric and double-layer waistband smoothes all over
Center-seam free design prevents camel toe
Designed to hit at your natural waist for great coverage and no muffin top
Cotton gusset makes panties optional and eliminates VPL (visible panty lines)
